item.title: Birthday - Asteroids
item.description: Recently, I celebrated a birthday. Typically, this is a joyous time, and I have many things to be grateful for. However, this birthday comes during a difficult year. As my wife and I were discussing this the other day, I realized that life can be a lot like the Atari game ‘Asteroids’. Atari Asteroids You, as the ship, must be able to re-orient and overcome challenges (blast asteroids) frequently and rapidly.
